item.title: CVE-2024-32083|2024-04-11T12:51:00.331Z -- Varun Kumar -- Easy Logo
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Varun Kumar Easy Logo allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Easy Logo: from n/a through 1.9.3.
